dose.general: Powders and Pills: 4-60g Do not decoct

indications: Childhood nutritional impairment or abdominal pain due to parasites

contraindications: Use caution for those with parasitic infestations along with Spleen or Stomach Deficiency.
Excessive use can lead to infertility.
Long-term use injures Yin in both men and women.

useCases: Childhood nutritional impairment and the pain associated with intestinal parasites.
Abdominal pain, parasites, a wan complexion, emaciation, and chronic diarrhea accompanying childhood nutritional impairment.

notes: This herb descends and drains to clear Damp-Heat while also killing parasites and reducing childhood nutritional impairment.
This herb operates by directly destroying the parasites.
